ISSUE.TITLE: Dashboard widget is showing up after removing `DashboardWidget` stereotype
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: To test the admin theme's Bootstrap 5.3.2 PR, I created a Content type with all parts in order to show them all in Edit. A very weird side effect is that the Dashboard displays the ListPart in its widgets. ![image](https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/assets/703248/ccaa0e95-ce2c-4bbc-9cfe-c2cef6da2dd5) There is also a Duplicated Dashboard title.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Do not show dashboard widget when `DashboardWidget` is removed. Fix #14596
